name: Hungry Crab
description:
Have you ever wondered what its like to be a crab? Sometimes you get hungry and need to eat. Sometimes that hunger can't be satisfied - by anything. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Tab - Pause

Credits:

Artist: Amber Bwandtz

Audio & Producer: Kat Fleck

Programmer: Raine Winter

*Created for the 2022 Trans GameDev CozyJam
